name: AOE
description:
AOE is a leading agile service provider for the development of digital solutions in the Enterprise sector. More than 250 employees at six global locations support major companies in the strategic and operative digitalization of their business models through the implementation of powerful, scalable and secure solutions. AOE relies on Open Source technologies, which enable customized solutions at reasonable costs.
In the development of complex projects, AOE relies on agile methods and processes and supports its customers with the introduction of agile methods. Agility allows concrete results at an early stage of the project and facilitates flexible changes during the course of the project. This greatly increases the project success rate and the benefit to the customer. This approach creates high-performance web portals, innovative E-Commerce platforms and flexible mobile applications.Â
